{"id":1498015661,"question_id":3634,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"10 months, 1 week","timestamp":1736045839,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"141 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1498015661/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Mirror Score of a String","memory":"48.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long calculateScore(string s) {\n        // set, to find\n        // property of set, always find the biggest/smallest\n        // after done, remove from set (else add to set)\n\n        set<pair<char, int>> st;\n        const auto mir = [](char c) {\n            return (char)((25-(c-'a'))+'a');\n        };\n\n        long long ans = 0;\n        int N = (int)s.size();\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            auto it = st.lower_bound({mir(s[i]), -i});\n            if (it != st.end() && it->first == mir(s[i])) {\n                ans += i + it->second;\n                st.erase(it);\n                continue;\n            } \n            st.insert({s[i], -i});\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-mirror-score-of-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1015}
